## Service Description

This is a Request for Proposal for Information Technology consultation services. 

## Procurement

- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and several others.

- **Address**: 235 Queen St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5

## Documents

Please see the attached files for the full solicitation. [link to documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8924/npp-ic208230.pdf)

## Selection Criteria

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
